name: Nohpill Park
content: N. Park's HTML Page Nohpill Park Associate Professor Department of Computer Science Oklahoma State University Stillwater, Oklahoma 74078 U. S. A. Email: npark at cs.okstate.edu Telephone: +1 (405) 744-7937 Telefax: +1 (405) 744-9097 Office: Mathematical Sciences Building, Room 219 Park received his Ph.D. from Texas A&M University in computer science in 1997. He joined the department in 1999. Professional Experiences Associate Professor (7/2004 - present) Assistant Professor (8/99 - 6/2004) Computer Science Oklahoma State University Oklahoma Air Logistics Center OC-ALC/TIET Technology and Engineering Project, CASI TIET 00-01-001, CDRL A001, 2001 Assistant Professor (8/97 - 5/99) Electrical and Computer Engineering South Dakota School of Mines and Technology NASA Marshall Space Flight Center (MSFC), Huntsville, AL (5/99 - 7/99) NASA/ASEE Summer Faculty Fellowship Program Modeling and Simulation Reliable Spacecraft On-Board Computing ORISE (Oak Ridge Institute for Science and Education) Research Participation Program at the U.S. Army Aberdeen Test Center (USAATC) (5/98 - 12/98) Modeling and Simulation: Reliable Mobile Network Research Associate Computer Science, Texas A&M University (10/96 -- 5/97) Modeling and evaluating the quality assurance of Field programmable systems Research Park's research is focused on Fuustack design and implementation for NFT (Non-fungible Token), Dependable/High Performance Blockchain-based Crypto Computing, Bigdata Analytics. Teaching CS5113 Computer Organization and Architecture CS5413 Data Structures and Algorithm Analysis II CS3353 Data Structures and Algorithm Analysis I CS3443 Computer Systems CS4323 Design and Implementation of Operating Systems I
